item.title: Motorising roller blinds and making them smart
item.description: In previous posts I discussed Live TV distribution, Smart Lighting and Smart Heating and Hot Water systems. Continuing with that theme, this post explores the journey of motorising roller blinds and making them “smart”. The requirements are similar to the previous posts: There must be no internet dependency and the blinds should be able to be controlled by a local interface. The cost of it should be affordable.

item.title: Combining smart switches and smart lights
item.description: Lighting is core to any smart home system. The systems attempt to make it as accessible as possible; there shouldn’t be a need to search for a light switch when entering a walkway a motion sensor should take care of it, there shouldn’t be a need to have to get out of bed to switch out the light before going to sleep, there shouldn’t be a need to run around every room before leaving the house to ensure lights are off and there shouldn’t be a need to manually turn on and off your outdoor lights every night.
